name: Local (RPG) DEV: Deploy & Build
command: CRTBNDRPG PGM(MYS_5DEV/&NAME) SRCSTMF('&FULLPATH') OPTION(*EVENTF) DBGVIEW(*SOURCE) TGTRLS(V7R3M0)

name: Local (SQLRPG) DEV: Deploy & Build
command: CRTSQLRPGI OBJ(MYS_5DEV/&NAME) SRCSTMF('&FULLPATH') COMMIT(*NONE) OPTION(*EVENTF *XREF *SEQSRC) TGTRLS(V7R3M0) CLOSQLCSR(*ENDMOD) DBGVIEW(*SOURCE) CVTCCSID(*JOB) COMPILEOPT('TGTCCSID(*JOB)')
